website_summaries.verdict: Capsule form L-Arginine supplement produced by a family-owned company using high-tech practices.
pros: USP pharmaceutical grade quality, contains no preservatives, dilutents, or artificial additives
From a family-owned manufacturer that produces product in-house using cutting-edge technology, and which focus on sustainability in its practices and charitable donations
Approved as effective by large majority of users
Low cost compared to other brands
cons: A relatively small percentage of users saw little or no benefit, a few users said it caused heartburn

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement for bros
customer_reviews.text: Good for the Dong (blood flow) and the baby batter (volume wise for sure).
customer_reviews.author: Like Love

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, my Dr would rather me use L-Arginine which is safer, instead of Vigra which he will not write a scrip for it..
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking the 1000 mg L-Arginine every morning with a couple other supplements for about 2 years. :-) The 500 mg L-Arginine every mid-morning along with 3 other supplements for about 2 years. :-) Then when the wife finally gets in one of her sexual moods, whether its late night or early morning I'll pop another 500 mg before hitting the bed room. :-) :-) I'm on heart medicine for A-fib and I haven't had a heart attack yet, great supplement with very positive results with the claims.
customer_reviews.author: Rvdan

customer_reviews.title: The real thing.
customer_reviews.text: I started with NOW L-arginine long ago. In between buying more bottles, I've tried other L-arginine brands. I keep coming back to this one because I feel the difference (weighlighting). It just works. I've tried the NOW L-arginine tablet form and i think it maybe more potent do to it being a tablet (broken in half) than the capsules, but these capsules are substantially easier to swallow than the tablets (I just double up with the capsules).
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works. I am a believer.
customer_reviews.text: I had read on one of my mountain bike forums about what this could do while out on the trail. I was a bit apprehensive as I normally don't take recommendations from people I don't know at all. I purchased these and began taking daily. I can honestly say it has increased my blood flow and oxygen levels I am assuming to my arteries and blood vessels opening up more. I am 53yrs old and taking these make me feel as though I am 25yrs old again on my mountain bike. I don't get as fatigued early and also, it actually enhances my riding endurance and abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Ken W.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: It has helped my circulation for sure. And seem to be more energetic too
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I feel like my blood flow has improved
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about 6 weeks, I believe it helps. I have a blood vessel issue, narrow vessels. MY Dr said why not try it , it will not hurt. I feel like my blood flow has improved, more energy, not tired. I will continue to use. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Candace C. Almers

customer_reviews.title: Preworkout Pump
customer_reviews.text: Arginine is a common ingredient in preworkout. It is broken down in your body to nitric oxide which is a vasodilator and can give you a nice pump. Try taking 1-2 grams before your workout, if you don't see much effects try upping the dose. Arginine and Citruline both work in the same way to raise nitric oxide, but Citruline works much more efficiently. During the process of being converted to nitric oxide, most of the Arginine is wasted. So next time I'm going to try Citruline
customer_reviews.author: Squidman

customer_reviews.title: I have been taking this product for a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for a couple of weeks now. I'm hoping they would help in lowering my blood pressure. I have not seen any noticeable change. I will continue to monitor, and maybe update later.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Was for my brother who has stents that are not doing well. He says this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Lou

customer_reviews.title: ... Mayo clinic and WebMd sights that there was very good evidence this could reduce bp
customer_reviews.text: I was having elevated BP and read articles on the Mayo clinic and WebMd sights that there was very good evidence this could reduce bp. Well it worked for me. I have been taking L-arginine for 6 weeks now first from local pharmacy then ordered this from amazon. my BP has now dropped back to normal range....but be sure to check with your Dr if you are taking BP meds or other meds as they can conflict..
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Taking in combination with NAC
customer_reviews.text: Taking this amino acid as I heard it's good in combination with NAC to help with producing glutathione. I haven't had any bad reactions, uncertain if it's working although I am feeling better, I feel like there is more blood flowing to my brain and it's been easier to think/less confusion. Will update if things change.
customer_reviews.author: Tenakareya

customer_reviews.title: Morning wood
customer_reviews.text: When I was younger,I used to wake up to a certain member being hard and as large as I could imagine. Once I started taking this, my member was strong and hard every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Boiler80

customer_reviews.title: Since I started taking this supplement I have noticed an ...
customer_reviews.text: Since I started taking this supplement I have noticed an increase in pump while weight training. I don't get fatigued as fast because of the extra blood-flow and oxygen to the muscles allowing me to get extra reps in. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: PaintingsByDarren

customer_reviews.title: Works after taking for 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I had consistently high blood pressure with headaches, low stamina etc. Seems like it was not working because I saw no difference during the first 5 weeks then suddenly about the 6 week mark my blood pressure finally is consistently in the normal range. Initially I took 3 pills, 3 times a day which is above what's recommended. Now I only take 2 pills, once or twice a day. Listen to your body and decide for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Giovman

customer_reviews.title: This little pill helped me breath without my asthma inhaler!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really surprised! I bought this product because I have a small blockage in my heart and I read the reviews but still was skeptical! My blood pressure is elevated and I have asthma which flares up every now and then. Well, yesterday I just received this bottle and couldn’t find my asthma inhaler so I took 2 tablets and went to bed on an empty stomach, I could soon after breath! I could feel my sinuses opening up and my lungs! I’m so happy I can hardly believe it!! Amazing! I’m sold!! WOW!!! Best night ever!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Denise S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality formulation.
customer_reviews.text: L-arginine is an amino acid that has proven benefits to people with poor kidney function, heart disease, and controlling blood sugar. For some, it has benefit for ED. At 70, I have all of these problems except high blood sugar. It has had visible results with one of these conditions (to put it politely) so I am inclined to believe it can be helpful for the other conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Leefers1

customer_reviews.title: Rising Blood Pressure
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to lower my blood pressure. I am a 57 year old female. I only took this product for 5 days. It actually was giving me higher blood pressure readings. I rated it 1 star because it didn't do what I bought it for. As far as any other claims for what it can do, I did not notice anything but, wasn't really looking for it to improve anything other than my blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I take it twice daily and it seems to be very effective in increasing my energy and sex drive. The pills are very easy to swallow. I will purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Shanevapid

customer_reviews.title: ... is very hard for me to tell if things like this really work
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard for me to tell if things like this really work. There is the placebo effect. I was very happy with the product and plan to buy it again. It seemed to have a positive effect.
customer_reviews.author: ArcticBonfire

customer_reviews.title: Potentiator for kratom.
customer_reviews.text: During my research on kratom (I am a consumer) I found that this product is useful for the body and helps to potentiate kratom usage. So I'm a guinea pig, by extension, to see if this is so. After a month I've noticed my kratom does seem to work better but I am on several other supplements for the same effect so I cannot really discern if this one does anything or not on it's own. But hey, it hasn't hurt me yet so I'm on it.
customer_reviews.author: Randall New

The least they could do is add some information in there letting cold sore sufferers know that if they choose to take this they may also want to take L-Lysine to balance it out. I had to learn the hard way...

product_meta.title: NOW Supplements, L-Arginine 500 mg, Nitric Oxide Precursor*, Amino Acid, 250 Capsules
product_meta.description:
Size:250 Count (Pack of 1)NOW L-Arginine comes in 500 mg capsules and is non-GMO. Arginine is a conditionally essential basic amino acid involved primarily in urea metabolism and excretion, as well as in DNA synthesis and protein production.* It is an important precursor of nitric oxide (NO) and thus plays a role in the dilation of blood vessels.* The L-Arginine used in this product is pharmaceutical grade. Natural color variation may occur in this product.

BRAND STORY
By NOW Foods
feature_bullets: CONDITIONALLY ESSENTIAL AMINO ACID: Arginine is a conditionally essential basic amino acid involved primarily in urea metabolism and excretion, as well as in DNA synthesis and protein production.*
NITRIC OXIDE PRECURSOR*: Arginine plays an important role in the dilation of blood vessels.*
CLASSIFICATIONS/CERTIFICATIONS: Non-GMO, Kosher (contains gelatin), Soy Free

GMP Quality Assured: NOW closely adheres to both mandatory U.S. FDA Current Good Manufacturing Practices (CGMP) regulations and voluntary Natural Products Association (NPA) Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) regulations. Good manufacturing practices ensure compliance with sanitation, processing, documentation, and testing requirements that are designed to promote consistent, highly reproducible product quality and safety.
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
